description: Table of modifiers related to transplant problems.

columns.name: PROBLEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of this Problem List entry.

columns.name: BIOPSY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Shows whether a biopsy was done to confirm organ rejection.  If a biopsy was performed, this column will display "yes." If not, the column will be blank.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not done


Rejection


No rejection

columns.name: STENT_INSERTED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not a stent has been inserted due to a bronchial stricture.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No
